cast.overview: Loving but irresponsible dad Daniel Hillard, estranged from his exasperated spouse, is crushed by a court order allowing only weekly visits with his kids. When Daniel learns his ex needs a housekeeper, he gets the job -- disguised as a British nanny. Soon he becomes not only his children's best pal but the kind of parent he should have been from the start.
cast.title: Mrs. Doubtfire

details.biography:
Adele Proom was an actress as well as director of local plays. She had ALS and died on March 2, 2001.

Her film credits included The Enforcer, Bullitt, Killer Klowns from Outer Space, The Candidate, Woman on Top, Sibling Rivalry, Mrs. Doubtfire, and So I Married An Axe Murderer. She also played roles in the television shows Nash Bridges, Midnight Caller, Unsolved Mysteries, and General Hospital.
details.name: Adele Proom
